chapters.title: Chapter 51: A Testing
chapters.info: King Easar Togita, p. 750—King of Shienar. He has a square face, and white hair in a topknot. He is a head shorter than Paitar of Arafel. Sadness is a permanent presence in his eyes. His third son is married to Ethenielle's daughter. His wife died about eleven years ago. He is currently in Far Madding with the rest of the rulers of the Borderlands.
